Service Details: - Provides professional counselling services by qualified, professional counsellors with Master’s degrees to lower income couples earning less than $45,000 annually- Program fee is $20.00 per session- Counselling may include ways to: enrich the closeness in your relationship, improve communication skills, understand and respect each others differences, enhance conflict resolution skills
Eligibility: Program offered to families who earn $45,000 gross or less annually
